item.title: Revisiting improved HTTP logging in ASP.NET Core 8
item.description: A few years ago, I had a play with HTTP logging added in ASP.NET Core 6. ASP.NET Core 8 introduced a set of additional configuration options that I believe are essential to make this feature usable. I will recap the details from the previous post below, but for asd Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/revisiting-improved-http-logging-in-asp-net-core-8/
